alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:26AM CDT until April 05 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BARTON AND CENTRAL JASPER COUNTIES... At 425 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alba, or 8 miles north of Carthage, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. Quarter size hail was reported in Oronogo. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Carterville, Jasper, Alba, Purcell, Nashville, Carytown, Fidelity, Neck City, Brooklyn Heights, Reeds, Atlas, Kenoma and Boston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 13 and 27. Interstate 49 between mile markers 36 and 62. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
